title: Since updating to 2.2rc2 not able to train network anymore
body:
Hello dear DeepLabCut-Team After having problems to to refine tracklets before, I updated to 2.2rc2 and started a new project to make sure everything is clean and not creating "old" problems. But now I don't even come as far as I used to, because my Systems simple seems to hang in "Starting multi-animal training....". I've been waiting for 8 hours now, and there are still no new iterations shown. I have no idea what went wrong this time. **I'm working on Windows 10, using DeepLabCut 2.1.10.4 and using the GUI-version of multi-animal estimation. I work over anaconda, using the GPU-Env. (GeForce GTX970, which is so weak I have to work with a batchsize of 2 and a global scale of 0.2) Please complete the following information about your system: OS: Windows 10 DeepLabCut Version: 2.2rc2 Anaconda env used: GPU
Code output

```python (DLC-GPU) C:\Users\stutz>python -m deeplabcut 2021-06-22 22:18:08.161368: I tensorflow/stream_executor/platform/default/dso_loader.cc:44] Successfully opened dynamic library cudart64_100.dll Starting multi-animal training.... ```

**How to Reproduce the problem** I simply labeled everything and now I want to train the created network, Ill use my scrrenshot of what I have done since restartingt DeepLabCut after the last restart due to the "hanger" **Screenshots** ![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84282406/122995376-d451da80-d3a9-11eb-8e5a-8fee706b63f4.PNG) ![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84282406/122995391-d74ccb00-d3a9-11eb-8bb7-62c82abe8a91.PNG) ![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84282406/122995397-d9168e80-d3a9-11eb-99c9-f42888d2ad58.PNG) ![4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84282406/122995402-dae05200-d3a9-11eb-85e1-f32739e35c61.PNG) I hope someone can tell me whats going on. I'm honestly loosing any hope in getting this project running (I'm trial and erroring for almost 2 months now and I start to fear for my computer^^)
